original_text: Neither by the blood of goats and calves, but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place, having obtained eternal redemption for us.
korean_text: 염소와 송아지의 피로 하지 아니하고 오직 자기의 피로 영원한 속죄를 이루사 단번에 성소에 들어가셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Neither by the blood of goats and calves
he entered in once into the holy place
having obtained eternal redemption for us
